content_descriptors.notes: "Life Gallery" contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: some violence, gore and sexually suggestive graphic involving murder and the use of tobacco and alcohol (including cutting conjoined twins, suffocating others with ropes, Reorganization or splicing of organs in the body), and the game characters have one-eyed and one-armed characteristics due to born with disabilities, and contain a small amount of cult elements.

name: 人生畫廊 Demo

Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
